data.title: Emeka Okafor Player Profile, Philadelphia Sixers
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Emeka Okafor on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 24, 2004 - The Charlotte Bobcats selected Emeka Okafor in Round 1 with Pick 2 in the 2004 NBA Draft. Jul 21, 2004 - Emeka Okafor signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Bobcats. Jun 25, 2005 - The Charlotte Bobcats exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Emeka Okafor. Jun 27, 2008 - The Charlotte Bobcats tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Emeka Okafor a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2008 - Emeka Okafor, previously with the Charlotte Bobcats, became a free agent. Jul 30, 2008 - Emeka Okafor signed a multi-year contract with the Charlotte Bobcats. Jul 28, 2009 - Emeka Okafor was acquired by the New Orleans Pelicans, along with a TPE, from the Charlotte Hornets in exchange for Tyson Chandler. Jun 20, 2012 - Emeka Okafor was acquired by the Washington Wizards, along with Trevor Ariza and a TPE, from the New Orleans Pelicans in exchange for Rashard Lewis and a 2012 2nd round pick (DAL own). Oct 25, 2013 - Emeka Okafor was acquired by the Phoenix Suns, along with a conditional 2014 1st round pick (WAS own) and cash, from the Washington Wizards in exchange for Shannon Brown, Marcin Gortat, Malcolm Lee and Kendall Marshall. Jul 1, 2014 - Emeka Okafor, previously with the Phoenix Suns, became a free agent. Jul 11, 2014 - The Phoenix Suns renounced their free-agent exception rights to Emeka Okafor. Sep 23, 2017 - Emeka Okafor signed a contract with the Philadelphia Sixers. Oct 14, 2017 - The Philadelphia Sixers placed the contract of Emeka Okafor on waivers. Oct 16, 2017 - Emeka Okafor, previously with the Philadelphia Sixers, became a free agent. Feb 3, 2018 - Emeka Okafor signed a contract with the New Orleans Pelicans. Feb 13, 2018 - Emeka Okafor, previously with the New Orleans Pelicans, became a free agent. Feb 14, 2018 - Emeka Okafor signed a contract with the New Orleans Pelicans. Feb 26, 2018 - Emeka Okafor, previously with the New Orleans Pelicans, became a free agent. Feb 26, 2018 - Emeka Okafor signed a multi-year contract with the New Orleans Pelicans. Sep 19, 2018 - The New Orleans Pelicans placed the contract of Emeka Okafor on waivers. Sep 21, 2018 - Emeka Okafor, previously with the New Orleans Pelicans, became a free agent. Sep 21, 2018 - Emeka Okafor signed a contract with the Philadelphia Sixers. Oct 13, 2018 - The Philadelphia Sixers placed the contract of Emeka Okafor on waivers.
